items.title: Learn how to make iPhone/android 2D Games without coding
items.headline: Become a game developer under one hour of training, the best kept secret of many indie game developers.
objectives_summary: Create a mobile game from scratch
Learn how to build 2D games
Learn how to port games to iPhone/Android,HTML5,Windows/Flash

items.title: Beginning Mobile Game Development with Solar2D
items.headline: Discover how to use the Solar2D framework to create your own mobile games.
objectives_summary: After completing the lessons you will have the knowledge to create your own mobile game for iOS or Android.
You will learn animating objects and sprites, how to play audio and sound effects, and even how to structure a complete game.

items.title: 3D Game Development with Blender
items.headline: Build anything you can imagine, and make fun 3D games!
objectives_summary: Build 3D models suitable for any game engine
Manipulate a 3D environment
Create custom mesh objects - vehicles, humanoids, animals

items.title: Become A Game Maker With GameMaker Studio 2

visible_instructors.name: Suspendee
visible_instructors.job_title: Game Development: Godot 3 & GameMaker Studio 2 Developer
visible_instructors.title: Suspendee Studios

items.headline: Learn to make GameMaker Studio 2 games with this walk-through on how to make a game.
objectives_summary: Develop games for GameMaker Studio 2
Implement features such as health into the game
Create a boss battle

items.title: Unity 2020 URP Make a juicy 2d Shooter prototype
items.headline: Create a fun shooting mechanic, simple enemy AI and juicy gameplay by adding visual and sound feedback
objectives_summary: Unity 2020 in 2D
C# programming
Game Development

items.title: Create a 3D Car Racing Game with THREE.js and CANNON.js
items.headline: Use the CANNON.js physics library and the WebGL library, THREE.js, to easily create a car racing game.
objectives_summary: You will have a knowledge of the THREE js library.
You will have a working knowledge of how a physics engine works. Particularly CANNON js
You will know how to adapt your assets to work with the CANNON RayCastVehicle class.

items.title: Beginner VR Oculus Rift Development with Unity3D
items.headline: Starting out with Virtual Reality Development for the Oculus Rift on Windows Using Unity3D with NO programming required.
objectives_summary: Understand the Challenges of Developing Virtual Reality Applications
Build Virtual Reality Applications Using Unity3D
Setup Unity3D for Virtual Reality Development

items.title: Game Development with PyGame  | Real World Games

visible_instructors.name: Martin
visible_instructors.job_title: Aerospace and Aeronautical Engineer, Software Developer
visible_instructors.title: Martin Yanev

items.headline: Learn PyGame by Developing Games From Scratch
objectives_summary: Learn the Python basics and apply them to real world projects.
Master the PyGame 2D game development.
Learn how the Object Oriented Programming is used in practice.

items.title: Becoming an Unreal Automation Expert

visible_instructors.name: Andreas
visible_instructors.job_title: VR Expert Lead Technical Artist Official Word Record Holder
visible_instructors.title: Andreas Hauber

items.headline: Using Blueprints, C++ and Python
objectives_summary: Power up your productivity with automation of tedious and repetitive tasks inside of Unreal
Learn how Python, C++ and Blutilities work inside of Unreal. How do they relate to each other, what is the benefit for each?
Increase your market value dramatically by learning automation. You will become an  irreplaceable asset in your team.

items.title: Lets Make a Hack n Slash game with SDL2 and C++
items.headline: Learn how to make a nice little hack n slash using SDL2 and C++ like a boss!
objectives_summary: Make small games with SDL2 and C++
Learn game development fundamentals and beginner principles
See how it feels to be an Indie Dev :D

items.title: Android Game Development - Create Your First Mobile Game
items.headline: Learn Android Game Development with Android Studio and Java by making a complete Flappy Bird game in SurfaceView
objectives_summary: In this course you'll be able to build a complete Flappy Bird game in less than 3 hours.
Building games is a great fun. You'll enjoy it.
A game that you build yourself, and publish is a fantastic resume piece and could help you get a great job in Android Development.

items.title: Create an Idle Tycoon Game using Bolt & Unity - NO CODING!

visible_instructors.name: Odoo Class
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert Business Application & Game Development Courses
visible_instructors.title: Odoo Class Videos

items.headline: Use the Powerful Visual Scripting Tool Bolt to Build a Fun Idle Tycoon Game in Unity - No Coding Required!
objectives_summary: Understand the power and flexibility of Bolt & Unity in making Games without Coding
Utilize Design Patterns to Create Increasingly Complex Games
Prototype Games Quickly Using the Bolt Visual Programming Tool & Unity

items.title: Building Perceptive AI in Unreal Engine
items.headline: AI Perception, Behaviour Trees, and EQS
objectives_summary: In this series we will be learning how to implement a perceptive AI solution where the AI will sense you via sight and hearing
We will also look at how to setup behavour trees and blackboard to react to the player, with shooting mechanics and ability activations
We will be using blueprint throughout, and no C++ will be required to make this work

items.title: Single&Multiplayer online game development Webgl's BabylonJs

visible_instructors.name: Ahmed
visible_instructors.job_title: MSc, Deep learning scientist @ Affectiva & Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Ahmed Fathy, MSc

items.headline: The Extensive Webgl Series ! - Part II : Single and client - server Multiplayer Game Development Using Babylon Js
objectives_summary: Understand and use the very nice game engine ( BabylonJs ) to create 3D online games (single-player and multi-player)
Learn NodeJs and Socket-io communication library

items.title: Simple HTML5 Game Development
items.headline: Learn to build a complete web or mobile video game using HTML5. No previous programming or web development required.
objectives_summary: Build a basic web page with HTML
Use CSS to add essential style to your page
Understand the main concepts of programming (variables, conditions, loops, branches, functions, and arrays) using JavaScript

items.title: Learning Path: C++ Game Programming
items.headline: Develop your game programming skills by creating  innovative and customized games from scratch with C++
objectives_summary: Get to know C++ from scratch while simultaneously learning game building
Learn the basics of C++, such as variables, loops, and functions, to animate game objects, respond to collisions, keep the score, play sound effects, and build your first playable game.
Use more advanced C++ topics such as classes, inheritance, and references to spawn and control thousands of enemies, shoot with a rapid fire machine gun, and realize random scrolling game worlds
